survey_brief: This survey aims to understand home gardening habits, preferences, and challenges to better support gardeners with resources and tools.

questions.question_text: How often do you engage in home gardening activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale to capture engagement levels.

script.question_text: How often do you engage in home gardening activities?

questions.question_text: What types of plants do you typically grow in your home garden? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Provide an 'Other' option for unlisted plant types.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an optional open-ended follow-up

script.question_text: What types of plants do you typically grow in your home garden? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you engage in home gardening?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open-ended follow-up

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you engage in home gardening?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face in home gardening? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover common challenges while allowing customization.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional open-ended follow-up

script.question_text: What challenges do you face in home gardening? (Select all that apply)
